reviewtext: Sure its a cd folder but they could have least of put the pages on 3-5 rings (instead of stitching the pages in) so at least that way the pages would not be lower than the outer zippers when it is opened up. You shouldnt have to worry about scratching your cds up on the zipper when you try to slide them back in. Get a Case Logic cd folder instead they use ring binders for better organization of the pages. This product is slightly less than average, even though it is only a cd folder they could have made it better for the cost.
